title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand it. The issue is related to scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. When I try to view the class hierarchies of internal jars in 'org.apache.ant', I see the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, I'm confused about the meaning of the message.
OB: When I try to view the class hierarchies of internal jars in 'org.apache.ant', I see the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars in 'org.apache.ant'.
SR:
1. Open the project that contains binary files.
2. Navigate to 'org.apache.ant' in the project.
3. Try to view the class hierarchies of internal jars.
4. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
